mapper.select: SELECT s.study_cd AS studyCd, s.study_title AS studyTitle, s.closed_at AS closedAt, s.study_limit AS studyLimit, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_study_member sm_count WHERE sm_count.study_cd = s.study_cd AND sm_count.status = 'JOINED' ) AS currentMembers FROM tb_study_member sm INNER JOIN tb_study s ON sm.study_cd = s.study_cd WHERE sm.user_id = #{user_id} AND sm.status = 'JOINED' ORDER BY sm.joined_at DESC;
